resources.string: mUzima PHR makes it easy to communicate by using your existing phone number and address book. Friends and contacts who already know how to contact you by phone will be able to easily get in touch by mUzima PHR.\n\nRegistration transmits some contact information to the server. It is not stored.
Please enter your mobile number to receive a verification code. Carrier rates may apply.
Please enter the verification code sent to %s.
